OnChange.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] Called when the "checked" state is changed.

[boolean] bVal
  Whether the checkbox is checked or unchecked.

SetBright.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] 

[boolean] bright
  true makes the text bright.

SetChecked.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] 

[boolean] checked
  Whether the box should be checked or not.

SetConVar.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] 

[string] convar
  The name of the convar to set

SetDark.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] 

[boolean] darkify
  True to be dark, false to be default

SetIndent.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] 

[number] ident
  How much in pixels to move the content to the right

SetTextColor.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] Sets the text color for the DCheckBoxLabel.

[table] color
  The text color. Uses the Color structure.

SetValue.description:
DCHECKBOXLABEL [Client] 

[boolean] checked
  Whether the box should be checked or not.
